methods.name: determineAggregationValue
methods.rawdescription: Determines the aggregation value based on the provided interval.
methods.description: Determines the aggregation value based on the provided interval.

methods.name: determineFirstNewAvailableAggregationValue
methods.rawdescription:
Determines the new aggregation value based on the current value and disabled options.

Goal is to switch to the next available aggregation option if the current one is disabled.
- If the current option is disabled, sets the control to the first available (non-disabled) option based on the following order:
  - If the current value is `DAILY`, it switches to `HOURLY` if it's not disabled, otherwise to `MINUTELY` if `HOURLY` is also disabled.
  - If the current value is `HOURLY`, it switches to `MINUTELY` if it's not disabled.
  - If all options are disabled, it sets the value to `NONE`.
methods.description:
Determines the new aggregation value based on the current value and disabled options.

Goal is to switch to the next available aggregation option if the current one is disabled.

  • If the current option is disabled, sets the control to the first available (non-disabled) option based on the following order:
    • If the current value is DAILY, it switches to HOURLY if it's not disabled, otherwise to MINUTELY if HOURLY is also disabled.
    • If the current value is HOURLY, it switches to MINUTELY if it's not disabled.
    • If all options are disabled, it sets the value to NONE.

methods.name: getDisabledAggregationOptions
methods.rawdescription:
Determines which aggregation options should be disabled based on the time range between two dates.
It calculates the time difference and checks against predefined time spans to decide if daily,
hourly, or minutely aggregations should be disabled.
methods.description: Determines which aggregation options should be disabled based on the time range between two dates. It calculates the time difference and checks against predefined time spans to decide if daily, hourly, or minutely aggregations should be disabled.

jsdoctags.comment: • The start date of the time range, as a Date object or an ISO date string.
• The end date of the time range, as a Date object or an ISO date string.
An AggregationOptionStatus object indicating the disabled state of each aggregation option.
